name: tacs
description:
Rules
  • Win by capturing the enemy leader (the guy with the staff) or bringing your leader to the enemy leader's starting position
  • After playing a move, it will be swapped with the move in the middle. This means your played move will be available to the enemy soon - and vice versa
Modes
  • Solo against a simple AI with three difficulty settings
  • Local mode where players take turn
  • Online multiplayer, the server address can be chosen with the --address command line option
Controls
  • Left mouse to select
  • Right mouse to deselect
  • Escape to quit

Assets by Kenney
